scripts.copy-assets: echo "copying Design System assets into /build folder" && rm -rf build && mkdir build && copyfiles -u 4 ../node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/assets/**/** build
scripts.create-sass: echo \"building CSS file from Design System and adding any local CSS\" && rm -rf build/stylesheet && sass assets/stylesheet/styles.scss build/assets/stylesheet/application.css
scripts.create-js: echo "creating JavaScript" && rm -rf build/javascript && copyfiles -u 2 ../src/assets/javascript/**/** ../src/assets/javascript/**/**/** build
scripts.build: npm run copy-assets && npm run create-js && npm run create-sass
